title: Describing Your Favorite Season
description: Write about your favorite season and why you like it.

prompt.description: Write about your favorite season. Describe the weather, activities, and why you prefer this season over others.
requirements: Describe the typical weather during this season
Use comparatives to compare with other seasons

exampleSentences.sentence: The weather is cooler and more comfortable than summer.
The temperature is usually between 15 and 20 degrees.
I love watching the colorful leaves.
I prefer this season because it's not too hot or cold.
exampleSentences.translation: 너무 덥지도 춥지도 않아서 이 계절을 선호해요.

vocabularyHelp.example: The weather is mild in spring.
The leaves are colorful in autumn.

usefulExpressions.example: Spring is my favorite because the weather is mild.
Autumn is better than summer for hiking.

usefulExpressions.usage: To express what you like doing
usefulExpressions.example: I love watching the snow fall.
The best thing about spring is the cherry blossoms.

items: Did you clearly state your favorite season?
Did you describe the typical weather?
Did you mention activities for this season?
Did you compare with at least one other season?
Did you explain why it's your favorite?
Did you use weather vocabulary appropriately?
Did you vary your sentence structures?
Is your writing at least 80 words?
Is your writing no more than 120 words?
Are your sentences a good length?
Is your description clear and engaging?
Do your sentences flow well together?
Is there variety in your vocabulary?
Did you complete within the time limit?
